title: The E8 Fractal Cosmology Model: A Comprehensive Thesis on Vibrational Field Theory, Golden-Ratio Scaling, and Unified Cosmological Phenomena
description: This repository contains the LaTeX source, data, and figures for the E8 Fractal Cosmology Model by Trent Slade (QSOL IMC). It integrates E8 symmetry, Ï†-scaling, and quantum information principles into a unified cosmological framework.
